DOC.brief_summary: Purpose study validation German version Injustice Experience Questionnaire . Pretest : Participants inform aim study fill consent form . They fill paper version German translation Injustice Experience Questionnaire . In structured interview patient ask item difficult understand , unacceptable offending . Subsequently answer question content mean IEQ-items . Validation Study : Participants inform aim study fill consent form . By e-mail received access link online survey . The questionnaire survey could fill home . The survey could interrupt terminate later . About 20 minute need answer 80 question survey . All data save anonymously survey .
DOC.brief_title: Validation German Version Injustice Experience Questionnaire
DOC.detailed_description: Pretest : Participants inform aim study fill consent form . A paper version German translation Injustice Experience Questionnaire complete presence interviewer . The structure standardize interview follow recommendation pretesting transcultural translation questionnaire . Patients ask item difficult understand , unacceptable offending . Subsequently answer question content mean IEQ-items . The interviewer ask question enter response . All data directly store MySQL database Swiss commercial web-server ( www.scientific-affairs.ch ) . Validation Study : Participants inform aim study fill consent sheet . By e-mail receive access link online survey complete home . The survey include following questionnaire : Injustice Experience Questionnaire ( IEQ ) , Depression subscale Depression , Anxiety Stress Scale ( DASS ) , Tampa Scale Kinesiophobia ( TSK ) , McGill Pain Questionnaire ( MPQ ) , Pain Catastrophizing Scale ( PCS ) , Pain Disability Index ( PDI ) part concern cause pain German Pain Questionnaire ( DSF ) . About 20 minute need answer 80 question survey . After complete survey participant choose would like informed result fill questionnaire . All data save anonymously survey store MySQL database Swiss commercial web-server ( www.scientific-affairs.ch ) .
DOC.criteria: pain ( face , head rest body ) good competence German language internet access able fill webbased survey adult disuse / dependency medication / drug
